Package entity

Class Player

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.Player
public class Player extends Entity
defines Class player, a subclass of Entity, which takes care of all player initialisations and interactions
Author:
Oomar, Sadiyah, Mrish

      public int getAttack()
      This returns the attack value. The total attack value is decided by strength and weapon.
      Returns:
